subject: Re: [junit] Component testing
msgSnippet: ... Yes, using the JNI... but it would be cumbersome. ... Yes. That would be less cumbersome. Using the right tool may help... funny, isn t it? ... Start with
messageBody:
On Monday 14 June 2004 10:26, Jagmohan S Nanaware wrote:
> Can I test C code using JUnit?
Yes, using the JNI... but it would be cumbersome.

> Can I use cppunit?
Yes. That would be less cumbersome.
Using the right tool may help... funny, isn't it?

> How do I do that?
Start with the cppunit documentation.

Robert
